Name: BlackSimulator
About the game: A SATIRICAL MINI GAME where you spend the day as a black man (er 'Blackmenn' if you prefer) on your day off. You must run 3 errands without getting shot or arrested by the Police! Depending on various choices your experience will differ either slightly or drastically with multiple playthroughs. Avoid the dangers of the PoPo Meter - Police suspicions increases with certain choices of attire, and behavior! I.G.N.A.N.T Meter , the rage is REAL - Attempt to avoid responses to rude people that may lead to someone calling the cops on you! T.O.M Meter - Attempt to maintain street cred even though it can be SERIOUSLY unhealthy to do so! Multiple ways to end your day off! With peace, or bullets. Blackness awaits!
